trans-unit.source: Represents an image annotation.
trans-unit.target: 表示图像批注。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the annotation image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注图像的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to align a non-scaled image.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于对齐非缩放图像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the annotation image.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>值，该值表示批注图像的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the annotation type name.
trans-unit.target: 获取批注类型名称。

trans-unit.source: This abstract property is used to get the name of each annotation type such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation>, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 此抽象属性用于获取每个批注类型的名称类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation>，依次类推。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: This property is for internal use.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅供内部使用。

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 批注类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the annotation image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注映像的名称。

trans-unit.source: The image name can be a file name, a URL or a named image—that is, its name component—from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 映像名称可以是文件名称、 URL 或已命名的映像-即，其名称组件-从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the annotation image.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示批注映像的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置绘制图像时将替换透明颜色的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be replaced with a transparent color when he image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>绘制图像时将替换透明颜色的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode of the image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图像绘制模式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value that defines the drawing mode of the image.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>枚举值，该值定义图像绘制模式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不适用于图像批注类型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text style of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注文本样式。

trans-unit.source: A TextStyle enumeration value that represents the style used to draw the annotation text.
trans-unit.target: 文本样式枚举值，表示用于绘制批注文本的样式。
